events.message: Candidate John Doe has submitted his application for the Software Engineer position, highlighting extensive experience in backend development and cloud infrastructure.
John Doe's application was categorised under the Engineering cluster based on his background in software development and DevOps technologies.
Recruiter Jane Smith has been assigned to manage John Doe's candidacy to proceed with screening and interview arrangements.
The initial phone screening with John went well, revealing strong problem-solving skills and a good cultural fit for the Engineering team.
John responded promptly to scheduling requests, confirming his availability for the upcoming technical interview next week.
The technical interview has been scheduled for John on May 10th at 10 AM with the senior engineering panel via video conference.
